Haneol

Korean: 한얼

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Park Han-eol
Native name:
박한얼
Birthday:
Jun 23, 1998
Age:
26 years old

Introduction

Park Haneol is a South Korean singer-songwriter under Big Soul Records. He made his solo debut on June 8, 2018 with the digital single "You Don't Know". He participated in the survival show Stars Awakening.
